articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Sony makes the “difficult decision” to raise PlayStation 5 prices in the US - Ars Technica
articles.description: Price hikes go into effect August 21; standard PS5 will now start at $550.

articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Google debuts Pixel Watch 4 with domed display, emergency Satellite Communication - TechCrunch
articles.description: The 41mm Pixel Watch 4 starts at $349 for Wi-Fi and $449 for LTE, while the 45mm version starts at $399 for Wi-Fi and $499 for LTE.
articles.content: At its Made by Google event on Wednesday, Google unveiled its new Pixel Watch 4. The smartwatch features a domed display, support for standalone satellite communication, enhanced health and fitness t… [+3339 chars]
